short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accent Press is a simple Chrome Extension that allows you to easily write accents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To type accents, simply hold the corresponding key on your keyboard. For example, to type √®, hold the "E" key on your keyboard until you reach √®. Simple!
